id.name: id
id.title: Identifier
id.description: The identifier for the URL object. Each URL must have a unique identifier.

label.name: label
label.title: Label
label.description: The human-readable label for this url e.g. “Twitter” or “Website”.

url.name: url
url.title: URL
url.description: The URL for this URL object. This must be formatted as a valid URI.
